**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 102 2.0 **Complexity** Simple A choir of lost souls rises out of the floor, singing an eerie chant that terrifies its listeners and buffets their bodies with walls of sound. --- **Stealth** DC 20 (expert) **Disable** DC 28 [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) (trained) to disrupt the song’s resonance with another tune or DC 28 [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46) (trained) to ritually silence the spirits **Profane Chant** ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=662)) **Trigger** A creature [moves](/Traits.aspx?ID=658) within 10 feet of the section of floor from which the choir can arise; **Effect** The choir rises, and its song deals 4d8+18 mental damage to nonevil creatures within 30 feet of the souls’ spectral forms. Affected creatures must each attempt a DC 24 Will save. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage and becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) 1.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and becomes frightened 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double damage. It also becomes frightened 3 and [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=74) for 1 round.
